title: Mat-less DDR
detail: "She's got accelerometers on the soles of her shoes"  -- Paul Simon
extended_details:
# Dance, Dance, Dance!  

> DDR without a mat.  We put clip-on accelerometers on your shoes, and then let you play right on the floor.

PSA: Our use of *DDR* refers to Dance, Dance Revolution.  It has nothing to do with memory interfaces.
